sourcesContent:
function JobCard({ job }) { return (

{job.title || "Untitled Position"}

{job.company || "Unknown Company"}
{job.location && (
{job.location}
)} {job.jobType && (
{job.jobType}
)} {job.date && (
{job.date}
)}
{job.description && (

{job.description.length > 150 ? `${job.description.substring(0, 150)}...` : job.description}

)}
View Job
) } export default JobCard
